summary: The module implements a ChipClassificationEvaluation class that aggregates prediction and ground‑truth labels for image chips, computes standard classification metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, F1, confusion matrix, etc.) using NumPy and scikit‑learn, and produces detailed evaluation items for reporting.
business_intent: To provide a reusable evaluation tool for assessing the performance of remote‑sensing models that classify image chips, enabling developers and analysts to quantify model quality and generate per‑class and overall statistics.
